### 1. Create Body Metrics
**POST** `/api/v1/body-metrics`

**Description**: Táº¡o báº£n ghi chá»‰ sá»‘ cÆ¡ thá»ƒ má»›i cho member

**Request Body**:
```json

  "memberId": 5,
  "measuredByUserId": 10,
  "measuredDate": "2026-01-14",
  "weight": 75.5,
  "height": 175.0,
  "muscleMass": 35.2,
  "bodyFatPercentage": 18.5
}
```

**Validation Rules**:
- `memberId`: Required, pháº£i tá»“n táº¡i trong database
- `measuredByUserId`: Optional, náº¿u cÃ³ pháº£i tá»“n táº¡i trong database (User)
- `measuredDate`: Required, format yyyy-MM-dd
- `weight`: Optional, pháº£i > 0 (kg)
- `height`: Optional, pháº£i > 0 (cm)
- `muscleMass`: Optional, pháº£i > 0 (kg)
- `bodyFatPercentage`: Optional, pháº£i >= 0 (%)

**Success Response** (201 Created):
```json

  "message": "Create new body metrics",

      "memberId": 5,

}
```

- BMI tá»± Ä‘á»™ng Ä‘Æ°á»£c tÃ­nh toÃ¡n: BMI = weight / (height/100)Â²

### 3. Fetch Body Metrics with Filter (Pagination)
**GET** `/api/v1/body-metrics/fetch`

**Description**: Láº¥y danh sÃ¡ch body metrics vá»›i phÃ¢n trang vÃ  lá»c theo Ä‘iá»u kiá»‡n

**Query Parameters**:
- `page`: Sá»‘ trang (báº¯t Ä‘áº§u tá»« 0), máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh = 0
- `size`: Sá»‘ lÆ°á»£ng item má»—i trang, máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh = 10
- `filter`: Spring-Filter expression (optional)

**Filter Examples**:
```

# Lá»c theo ngÃ y Ä‘o
?filter=measuredDate>='2026-01-01'

# Lá»c theo khoáº£ng thá»i gian
?filter=measuredDate>='2026-01-01' and measuredDate<='2026-01-31'

# Lá»c theo BMI

# Lá»c theo ngÆ°á»i Ä‘o
?filter=measuredBy.id==10

# Lá»c theo tá»· lá»‡ má»¡
?filter=bodyFatPercentage>=15.0 and bodyFatPercentage<=20.0
```

**Full Request Example**:
```

```

## ğŸ“ Notes

### BMI Calculation Logic
- BMI tá»± Ä‘á»™ng Ä‘Æ°á»£c tÃ­nh khi táº¡o má»›i hoáº·c cáº­p nháº­t
- CÃ´ng thá»©c: **BMI = weight (kg) / (height/100 (m))Â²**
- LÃ m trÃ²n Ä‘áº¿n 2 chá»¯ sá»‘ tháº­p phÃ¢n
- Náº¿u height = 0 hoáº·c null â†’ BMI = null
- Náº¿u weight = null â†’ BMI = null

### BMI Classification (WHO Standard)
- **< 18.5**: Underweight (Thiáº¿u cÃ¢n)
- **18.5 - 24.9**: Normal weight (BÃ¬nh thÆ°á»ng)
- **25.0 - 29.9**: Overweight (Thá»«a cÃ¢n)
- **â‰¥ 30.0**: Obese (BÃ©o phÃ¬)

### Measured By (Optional Field)
- `measuredByUserId` cÃ³ thá»ƒ null (member tá»± Ä‘o)
- Náº¿u cÃ³ giÃ¡ trá»‹, pháº£i lÃ  User ID há»£p lá»‡
- ThÆ°á»ng lÃ  PT hoáº·c Staff Ä‘o cho member

### Data Types & Precision
- `weight`: DECIMAL(5,2) - Max 999.99 kg
- `height`: DECIMAL(5,2) - Max 999.99 cm
- `muscleMass`: DECIMAL(5,2) - Max 999.99 kg
- `bodyFatPercentage`: DECIMAL(5,2) - Max 99.99%
- `bmi`: DECIMAL(5,2) - Auto-calculated

### Pagination
- Endpoint `/fetch` há»— trá»£ Spring Data JPA Specification
- CÃ³ thá»ƒ filter theo: member.id, measuredDate, weight, height, bmi, bodyFatPercentage, measuredBy.id
- Há»— trá»£ cÃ¡c operator: `==`, `!=`, `>`, `<`, `>=`, `<=`, `and`, `or`

**Example Timeline**:

## âš ï¸ Common Errors

### 1. Member khÃ´ng tá»“n táº¡i
**Error**: `Member not found with id: {id}`
**Cause**: Member ID khÃ´ng tá»“n táº¡i trong database
**Solution**: Kiá»ƒm tra láº¡i Member ID hoáº·c táº¡o Member trÆ°á»›c

### 2. User (measuredBy) khÃ´ng tá»“n táº¡i
**Error**: `User not found with id: {id}`
**Cause**: measuredByUserId khÃ´ng há»£p lá»‡
**Solution**: Kiá»ƒm tra láº¡i User ID hoáº·c Ä‘á»ƒ null náº¿u member tá»± Ä‘o

### 3. Body metrics khÃ´ng tá»“n táº¡i
**Error**: `Body metrics not found with id: {id}`
**Cause**: Body metrics ID khÃ´ng tá»“n táº¡i
**Solution**: Kiá»ƒm tra láº¡i ID hoáº·c dÃ¹ng GET `/fetch` Ä‘á»ƒ xem danh sÃ¡ch

### 4. Validation failed - Weight
**Error**: `Weight must be greater than 0`
**Cause**: Weight <= 0 hoáº·c null khi required
**Solution**: Nháº­p giÃ¡ trá»‹ há»£p lá»‡ > 0

### 5. Validation failed - Height
**Error**: `Height must be greater than 0`
**Cause**: Height <= 0 hoáº·c null khi required
**Solution**: Nháº­p giÃ¡ trá»‹ há»£p lá»‡ > 0 (Ä‘Æ¡n vá»‹: cm)

### 6. Validation failed - Date
**Error**: `Measured date is required`
**Cause**: KhÃ´ng cung cáº¥p measuredDate
**Solution**: Cung cáº¥p ngÃ y Ä‘o (format: yyyy-MM-dd)

### 7. Invalid date format
**Error**: `Failed to convert value of type 'java.lang.String' to required type 'java.time.LocalDate'`
**Cause**: measuredDate khÃ´ng Ä‘Ãºng format
**Solution**: Sá»­ dá»¥ng format yyyy-MM-dd (vÃ­ dá»¥: 2026-01-14)

## ğŸ” Security

- Táº¥t cáº£ endpoints yÃªu cáº§u authentication (401 náº¿u chÆ°a Ä‘Äƒng nháº­p)
- Authorization:
  - Member chá»‰ cÃ³ thá»ƒ xem/táº¡o/sá»­a body metrics cá»§a chÃ­nh mÃ¬nh
  - PT cÃ³ thá»ƒ xem/táº¡o/sá»­a body metrics cá»§a há»c viÃªn Ä‘Æ°á»£c phÃ¢n cÃ´ng
  - Admin cÃ³ thá»ƒ xem/táº¡o/sá»­a/xÃ³a táº¥t cáº£ body metrics
- Audit fields (createdBy, updatedBy) tá»± Ä‘á»™ng láº¥y tá»« SecurityContext
- Náº¿u khÃ´ng cÃ³ user trong context, sáº½ dÃ¹ng "system" lÃ m default

## ğŸ“ˆ Data Analysis Tips

### Tracking Progress
- So sÃ¡nh BMI giá»¯a cÃ¡c láº§n Ä‘o
- Theo dÃµi xu hÆ°á»›ng weight (tÄƒng/giáº£m)
- PhÃ¢n tÃ­ch tá»· lá»‡ muscle mass vs body fat percentage

### Healthy Ranges (General Guidelines)
**Body Fat Percentage**:
- Men: 10-20% (Athletic), 14-24% (Fitness)
- Women: 20-30% (Athletic), 24-31% (Fitness)

**Muscle Mass**:
- Varies by height, age, gender
- Typically 30-50% of body weight

### Measurement Frequency
- Weekly: Cho member Ä‘ang giáº£m cÃ¢n/tÄƒng cÆ¡ tÃ­ch cá»±c
- Bi-weekly: Cho member duy trÃ¬
- Monthly: Cho member casual

---

**End of BodyMetricsController Documentation**
